abstract: Forget exit polls — Twitter and YouTube let you find out what’s going on with individual voters.
snippet: Forget exit polls — Twitter and YouTube let you find out what’s going on with individual voters.
lead_paragraph: For those who are clicking from FiveThirtyEight to Politico to Drudge and back again vainly searching for fresh information on Tuesday’s elections, there’s good news: Web sites like Twitter and YouTube are providing real-time updates from the polls, voter by voter. And Google offers a window into our collective interests by showing what the world is searching for right now.

headline.main: Taking the Digital Pulse of Voters, One at a Time
